snippet: A play about the Yankees is headed to Broadway, perhaps by late next year, and will include Babe Ruth, Lou Gehrig, Joe DiMaggio, Mickey Mantle and Derek Jeter as characters.
abstract: New unnamed play about New York Yankees is headed to Broadway and will include Babe Ruth, Lou Gehrig, Joe DiMaggio, Mickey Mantle and Derek Jeter as characters.
lead_paragraph: A play about the Yankees is headed to Broadway, perhaps by late next year, and will include Babe Ruth, Lou Gehrig, Joe DiMaggio, Mickey Mantle and Derek Jeter as characters.

headline.seo: New Broadway Play to Focus on Yankees
headline.main: Broadway Play to Include Yankees From Ruth to Jeter
headline.print_headline: Broadway Play to Include Yankees From Ruth to Jeter
